body:
@Shizas 
Nhentai doujins are originally downloaded from e-hentai.org. On e-hentai.org, "gender bender" was changed to "gender change" due to "gender bender" used to be mutually exclusive with "body swap", which used to be very confusing. In addition, many people dislike "gender bender" doujin with elemets such as possession and bodyswap The tag "gender morph" is now a seperate one for only transformation from male to female and vice versa. Copy this comment to every hentai if anyone ask this question. Original forum thread: https://forums.e-hentai.org/index.php?showtopic=253088
What are the admins smoking up to have an idea to remove using Gender Bender tag Anymore?. Its stupid
Am I missing something at the end? Did he rig the lottery so he would be wearing it this time? Also, yeah what's with the new gender tag?
why people have stop using the "gender bender" tag and put "gender change" or other things?

so this is gay... they (as in boys), do the lotery the looser has to use a suit and that turns him in to a woman and then the rest of the guys gang bang him

The end is not confusing the guys are saying "let's do it (fuck him) again" meanwhile the dude is removing the suit, hears them and says "yeah, right"
I've waited for this for 2 years!
I felt pain as soon as I understood what happened it’s just weird
